title: Autopsy Report
content: The autopsy report reveals that Đen Vâu was poisoned. The poison was found in a glass of whiskey he had been drinking, making it clear that this was a deliberate act. However, the identity of the poisoner remains a mystery.

title: Blood Toxicology Report
content: Further investigation reveals that Đen Vâu's blood contained traces of a rare poison only accessible to someone with a deep knowledge of chemistry. This clue implicates someone with expertise in the field, such as Josh, who works in IT.

title: Incriminating Evidence
